      • getPageSize

        public int getPageSize()
        The pageSize for this query. Will be <= 0 if not relevant for the query.

      • getPagingState

        public PagingState getPagingState()
        The paging state for this query, or null if not relevant.

      • getSerialConsistency

        Serial consistency for conditional updates.

      • getTimestamp

        public long getTimestamp(QueryState state)

      • getProtocolVersion

        public abstract int getProtocolVersion()
        The protocol version for the query. Will be 3 if the object don't come from a native protocol request (i.e. it's been allocated locally or by CQL-over-thrift).

        public QueryOptions prepare(java.util.List<ColumnSpecification> specs)
